text: 2.19 Jon 8.34, Lom 6.16, 1 Pi 2.16 Pen kɨli anɨb apal, Chɨnop kɨdek gem, nag lup ak kelɨgɨl koŋɨm amɨl, gos chɨn ke kɨdek gun agɨl ak nep gɨnɨgabɨm apal. Anɨb apal ak pen, kɨli ke pel gɨ tɨmel gɨpal ak kɨlop pen gɨ tɨmel gek, bɨ yokɨp wog gɨñeb tek mɨdebal. Chɨn nopun, bɨ olap ne kelɨgek tap ogɨnap nop kodek, bɨ anɨb ak ne tap anɨb okok bɨ wog gɨñeb tek mɨdeb.
